title: Rachel Reeves – 2020 Comments on a Brexit Deal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rachel Reeves, the Shadow Minister for the Cabinet Office, on 5 December 2020.
content:
The British people were promised a deal and, with time running out, we urge both sides to get on with reaching an agreement.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

We can then focus on the job at hand which is securing the economy and rebuilding our country from the pandemic.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
